channel.title: Clicking Buttons [HELP]
channel.description:
Hey, I just found out my server has a skillcape shop with custom interface and basically it looks like this:
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2ag6qd.png[/img]
Anyways, The thing is I wan't it to give a skillcape and take away 99k and only can purchase if you have the 99 in that skill to purchase it otherwise it will say a message saying you do not have 99 in this skill so you cannot buy it etc.
Also how do I make it when I click the x button it exits the interface, It's my first time working with this type of coding in RSPS so like once I learn it will be easier for me and not needing me to get help.
Can someone give me it for like attack cape then I will change it for the others.
Thanks, Mr Rushed

item.title: Clicking Buttons [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Mr Rushed:

Bump diddy bump, Someone help plox? It lets you buy skillcape even if you don’t have the 99 in the skill.

Already gave you the code and told ya the fix… You must be perdy stupid.

Read full topic

item.title: Clicking Buttons [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Rushed Mr Rushed
item.description:
@Mr_Rushed wrote:

Err, Some help here please?

You can purchase the skillcape even if you don’t have 99 here is the whole code

case 115180: if (c.inWild()) { c.sendMessage("You can't buy this in the wilderness!"); } else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 99000)) { c.getItems().deleteItem(995, 99000); c.getItems().addItem(9748, 1); c.getItems().addItem(9749, 1); } else if (c.playerLevel[0] < 99) { c.sendMessage("You need 99 Attack to buy this cape."); } break; case 115186: if (c.inWild()) { c.sendMessage("You can't buy this in the wilderness!"); } else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 99000)) { c.getItems().deleteItem(995, 99000); c.getItems().addItem(9082, 1); c.getItems().addItem(9083, 1); } else if (c.playerLevel[7] < 99) { c.sendMessage("You need 99 Cooking to buy this cape."); } break; case 115189: if (c.inWild()) { c.sendMessage("You can't buy this in the wilderness!"); } else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 99000)) { c.getItems().deleteItem(995, 99000); c.getItems().addItem(9781, 1); c.getItems().addItem(9782, 1); } else if (c.playerLevel[12] < 99) { c.sendMessage("You need 99 Crafting to buy this cape."); } break; case 115192: if (c.inWild()) { c.sendMessage("You can't buy this in the wilderness!"); item.title: Clicking Buttons [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“Mr Rushed, post:8, topic:425526”][quote author=mr extremez link=topic=528188.msg3851586#msg3851586 date=1324069317]

I know the actionbutton ID but all I need to know what coding I should put in clickingbuttons for E.G.

case 29123:
Coding here

Someone please help…

KK sry i was eating just got your message on your xat so ill try to write up the code for the first one.

case 29123: if (c.inWild()) { c.sendMessage("You can't buy this in the wilderness!"); } else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 99000)) { c.getItems().deleteItem(995, 99000); c.getItems().addItem(id, amount); } else if (c.playerLevel[skill] < 99) { c.sendMessage("You need 99 Your skill to buy this cape."); } break;

For the x

case: c.getPA().closeAllWindows(); break;
[/quote]

Tysm, I would rep you higher but ur 200 already :P[/quote]
Np

Read full topic

item.title: Clicking Buttons [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Rushed Mr Rushed
item.description:
@Mr_Rushed wrote:

[quote=“Native^, post:11, topic:425526”][quote author=Mr Rushed link=topic=528188.msg3851694#msg3851694 date=1324074864]

Well, an if(-else) statement would work -.-, and just find out the button id.

Huh?
[/quote]
Idk your variables, so…

switch(clickingButton){
 
case 40:
if(player.getSkills().getLevelForId(0) != 99){
player.getActionSender().sendMessage("Skill level not high enough.");
return;
}
else {
if(player.getInventory().hasItem(955, 99000)
player.getInventory().addItem(4151, 1);
else 
player.getActionSender().sendMessage("Not enough money");
}
break;
}

And I wrote this in the comment box, so it’s a little messy.

Oh and the line with

sucks a little.[/quote]

Damn, A little to late I added the other one already.

Read full topic

switch(clickingButton){

if(player.getSkills().getLevelForId(0) != 99){

return;
}
else {
if(player.getInventory().hasItem(955, 99000)
player.getInventory().addItem(4151, 1);
else

break;
}

@Mr_Rushed wrote:

Hey, I just found out my server has a skillcape shop with custom interface and basically it looks like this:

Anyways, The thing is I wan’t it to give a skillcape and take away 99k and only can purchase if you have the 99 in that skill to purchase it otherwise it will say a message saying you do not have 99 in this skill so you cannot buy it etc.

Also how do I make it when I click the x button it exits the interface, It’s my first time working with this type of coding in RSPS so like once I learn it will be easier for me and not needing me to get help.
